It should maintain a safe distance from the concrete mixer truck in front to allow for adequate reaction time if the truck stops suddenly or moves erratically. The car should also be prepared for the possibility of the pedestrian in red attempting to cross the road when it becomes safe. Furthermore, the ego car should drive cautiously and at a lower speed due to the police presence. Overall, the car should remain alert to all road signs and signals, as well as the activities of surrounding vehicles and pedestrians. Given the information obtained, the ego vehicle should maintain a safe following distance from the concrete mixer truck, be prepared for the unexpected behaviors of the law enforcement vehicle, respect the traffic signs, abide by the red traffic light by stopping, and monitor the pedestrian for any signs of entering the roadway. Until the light turns green, the ego vehicle should remain stationary, and once the path is clear to proceed, continue with caution due to the potential nearby construction activity indicated by the barriers.
